JWTs.jl

  • Readme
  • Docstrings
    • Docstrings
    Docstrings
    JWTs.JWK — Constant.

    JWK represents a JWK Key (either for signing or verification).

    JWK can be either a JWKRSA or JWKSymmetric. A RSA key can represent either the public or private key.

    JWTs.JWKRSA
    JWTs.JWKSet — Type.

    JWKSet holds a set of keys, fetched from a OpenId key URL, each key identified by a key id.

    The key URL can either be of http(s):// or file:// type.

    JWTs.JWKSymmetric
    JWTs.JWT — Type.

    JWT represents a JWT payload at the minimum.

    When signed, it holds the header and signature too. The parts are stored in encoded form.
